body_html:
@monajalal The line 73 in label_image.py is label_file = "tf_files/retrained_labels.txt". So, if you don't pass --labels flag, it refers to label file of flowers dataset. Your command should be

python -m scripts.label_image --graph=dataset/retrained_graph.pb --image=dataset/charmander/charmander30.jpg --labels=dataset/retrained_labels.txt

You are getting list index out of range because the flowers dataset has 5 labels and I can see that you have 20.
body:
@monajalal The line [73](https://github.com/googlecodelabs/tensorflow-for-poets-2/blob/master/scripts/label_image.py#L73) in [label_image.py](https://github.com/googlecodelabs/tensorflow-for-poets-2/blob/master/scripts/label_image.py) is `label_file = "tf_files/retrained_labels.txt"`. So, if you don't pass `--labels` flag, it refers to label file of flowers dataset. Your command should be 
```
python -m scripts.label_image --graph=dataset/retrained_graph.pb --image=dataset/charmander/charmander30.jpg --labels=dataset/retrained_labels.txt
```
You are getting `list index out of range` because the flowers dataset has 5 labels and I can see that you have 20.
